frameset.edef: to make an error or a mistake

example.parse: (NP-TPC-1 (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM -كَثِيرٌ)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عُلَماءِ) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدِّينِ) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الإِيرانِيِّينَ))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP اِعْتَرَفُوا) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *T*)) (SBAR (PREP بِ-) (SUB_CONJ -أَنَّ-) (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_3MP -هُم)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP أَخْطَأُوا) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *T*)) (SBAR (WHADVP-3 (SUB_CONJ عِنْدَما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP تَوَلَّوْا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المَناصِبَ) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الرَّسْمِيَّةَ)) (ADVP-TMP-3 (-NONE- *T*))))))))) (PUNC .))
